name: Apocalipse Zumbi V.1.0
description:
Controls: 

You can walk with directional arrows or with WASD. 

Left mouse button: Shoot. Restart: Left mouse button. 

Close: Alt+f4 

The game takes place in a closed environment, it will be updated with a new version in the future. :)

Music credits: TeknoAXE's Royalty Free Music
